title: Blink Dog
description: Highly intelligent, dingo-like dogs that live in packs. Have the innate ability to blink in and out of existence.
extras: Blink: In combat, teleport close to an enemy, attack, then reappear 1d4 × 10’ away. If they have initiative, can blink away without the opponent being able to counter-attack. Disappear: If in serious danger, the pack can flee by entirely disappearing. Hate warp beasts: Always attack.
